name: Soccer on an Expanding Field
description:
Play soccer on a field that doubles every time a goal is scored. For two players. Made by Peter Sheehan, 2019. Every time a goal is scored, the field doubles in size.

Controls:

Supports Xbox Controllers on both Windows and Mac
Xbox Controls:

A/Y - pass ball/change team mate
X/B - Steal ball/kick ball
Back - reset
Left stick - move
Right stick - change camera Keyboard Controls: Player 1:  z/c - pass ball/change team mate
x/v - steal ball/ kick ball
r - reset
wasd - move
1, 2 - change look view Player 2:  n/comma - pass ball/change team mate
m/period - steal ball/ kick ball
r - reset
arrow keys - move
9, 0 - change look view
